name: Dainsleif
desc: A World Quest Series following Dainsleif, a peculiar stranger who is tracking down the Abyss Order.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Unlock Requirements</color>
Archon Quest Chapter I: Act III "A New Star Approaches"
<color=#ffffff>Starting Location</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Mondstadt, Mondstadt</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: Dainsleif
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Dainsleif, a peculiar stranger who is tracking down the Abyss Order.

customize.name: Bough Keeper: Dainsleif
customize.desc: Katheryne of the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild seems to have something to tell you.

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Guide to Freedom
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

customize.name: Guide to Resistance
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

customize.name: Guide to Ballad
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Wonders of the World</color>
<color=#ffffff>Achievement</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reward</color>
<color=#ffd780>Bough Keeper: Dainsleif</color>
<color=#ffffff>Gears of Destiny</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Complete the quest "Bough Keeper: Dainsleif".</color>

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Abyss Order
customize.desc: An organization comprised of the cursed Khaenri'ahns and non-human monsters. They are the enemies of surface civilization and thrive in many corners of the world. Their main goal is to destroy the world under the rule of The Seven.

customize.name: Wagner
customize.desc: Mondstadt's blacksmith who despises small talks and prefers being left to his work.

customize.name: Charles
customize.desc: The bartender at Angel's Share. He will sell various drink-based food items.

customize.name: Dainsleif
customize.desc: A former captain of the Khaenri'ahn Royal Guard, who was cursed by Celestia with immortality.
